description: Bluestem Group Inc., through its subsidiaries, offers a selection of name-brand, private label, and non-branded merchandise through Internet Websites and catalog serving low to middle income consumers in the United States. It operates through Northstar Portfolio and Orchard Portfolio segments. The Northstar Portfolio segment consists of Fingerhut and Gettington retail brands. This segment offers consumer electronics, domestics, housewares, and home furnishings. The Orchard Portfolio segment comprises of Tog Shop and WinterSilks retail brands. This segment provides apparel, accessories, and home products for women and men through various platforms, including online and direct mail. Bluestem Group Inc. also offers bed and bath, lawn and garden, and hardware products; video games, toys, and sporting goods; and footwear, cosmetics, fragrances, and jewelry products. The company was formerly known as Capmark Financial Group Inc. and changed its name to Bluestem Group Inc. in June 2015. Bluestem Group Inc. was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Eden Prairie, Minnesota.
